website_summaries.verdict: Nike unleashes the latest generation of its Vapormax sneakers, in Nike Air Vapormax 2019. The iconic heel-to-toe visible Air units and their level of comfort remain the same. But instead of a Flyknit upper, it now has a stretchy, lightweight, durable, and transparent shell, comprised of textile and synthetic materials.Decked in a futuristic silhouette, laden in rich, vibrant colorways, the Vapormax 2019 looks to set trends and change the sneaker game, as it exudes that trendy high-performance look.
pros: Heaps of shoppers are drawn to its futuristic styling and fascinating colorways of the Nike Air Max Vapormax 2019
This kind of Nike sneakers can easily match various casual outfits, according to a lot of wearers
More than a handful of people share that they can wear them all day (standing and walking long periods) without feeling pain anywhere in the foot
Its air bubbles feel so comfortable and bouncy on feet, according to various testers
Some reviewers prefer this 2019 Nike Air Vapormax over the previous Vapormaxes, saying that this one feels upgraded, hence more superior in quality
Several wearers observe that their feet breathe well inside the shoe’s woven, transparent upper
It feels pleasant and light on feet, which many users find perfect for their travels
This Nike model is worthy of its slightly expensive price, according to most purchasers
cons: The air bubble feels thin and doesn’t have much support in the heel area, according to some users
Quite a few users feel awkward about the sneaker having no midsole that they had to add an extra insole to “fix” it
Some customers have reported about bubbles (or pods) bursting after wearing the shoe for a month or two
The shoe makes squishy sounds on hard floors, which a couple of wearers find annoying

customer_reviews.title: Real Nike or Chinese Knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: I am concerned about the quality. Are these real Nike shoes? After a week of wear the side panels started to degrade (see photos). Would real Nike shoes do this? Are these Chinese knockoffs?
customer_reviews.author: David Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Are these real nikes?
customer_reviews.text: Not as good quality as the ones we saw at the nike stores. Hmm??? The air pockets popped already. Maybe it was just ours?
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Got my package and was so happy! But just to find out a size 13 feels like a 11.5 or 12. Order over your size. Not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tblobos72

customer_reviews.title: Not lasting, sole broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s school. He started wearing it everyday to school since end Aug. the sole broke today! It lasted only for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Anupam Shriniwas

customer_reviews.title: it is almost good but not quite right
customer_reviews.text: it is loose on top of the foot, it fabric cut a bit long as it does not wrap over my feet snug, there is some slack; I like the design and the build is also good; may be some little work is needed for some feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes but not so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I returned these for a refund - and was promptly refunded. Thanks for that (FBA I think). The photos are excellent and the shoes look really good out of the box. But the challenge in buying shoes without trying them on means that when I did try them on - they just were not comfortable. This is not a knock against the seller. So I give 5 stars since I was promptly refunded.
customer_reviews.author: MeteorPETE Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Super Lightweight Yet Highly Cushioned
customer_reviews.text: Very light, yet cushiony to protect my fragile hips. Easy to lace and unlace. Long lasting. Size runs a little small, so they are snug. Liked them so much I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: veritas

customer_reviews.title: Nasty shoes dirty and bloody
customer_reviews.text: I opened these shoes to see BLOOD stains , burn marks, looks like they were from the first 48. I didn't know to call customer service or the police to report a murder. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Billie n.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, sturdy and Cool!l
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cool, stylish and rugged. I liked the way it looked. Unfortunately, I had a problem with the left pair of the sneakers, it waz rather tight and uncomfortable. Perhaps half a size larger should be the standard. Worth looking into.
customer_reviews.author: penka

customer_reviews.title: Show blew out after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Terrible with no return. Loved the shoe until it blew out. I wasn’t even running, just walking around. Friend told me not to buy these because he told me this would happened. Should have listened. Worst part is it blew out right after my return date so I’m just out $200.00.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: No box???
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were just fine and my husband loved them but they did not come with the original box. I did not like that at all. Seems a little sketchy to me. I would have returned them but my husband wanted to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: awesome

customer_reviews.title: Faded color.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike, is the picture that which was displayed is not a match,I looked for a navy blue its more of a faded color of gray and black,its ok,nothing more or less,please give a complete color description. And a clearer picture.
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Nike’s, fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for Father’s Day! I usually go on the amazon wish list of the hubby and see what he has in there. I’ll put forward it to my phone and buy something on there. He was so surprised when he got these! They are authentic Nike’s! Vibrant color! Got the orange ones
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: They are not black
customer_reviews.text: The description clearly says black and metallic gold. They are not black...they are gray. Item never worn - returned the next day after arrival. For $200.00....you would expect better results
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were not new
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived in a used white Nike box wrapped with a rubber band. They were not clean like a new shoe, but had traces of dust/use on the underside and clear creases on the top of the shoe from having been lightly used. The kicker was the smell. They absolutely did not have that 'new shoe' smell. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe, just decent
customer_reviews.text: The shoes do fit a bit loose across the top by your toes.....it’s not a snug fitting shoe like you might think. And the goldish color across the bottom does look a bit cheap, almost like it was spray painted on. Comfortable fit, just a little disappointed with the looks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sorrells

customer_reviews.title: USED not new shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was sent someones return. I paid for a NEW pair of shoes. Shoe has cat hair and spots on it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Very upset for a little 9 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Very upset got the shoes for our grandson it hasn’t even been 2 months and one of the bubbles got a hole deflated he is in tears.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ken is a great retailer!
customer_reviews.text: Ken sent my pair pair of sneakers (Nike Men’s vapormax 2019 Black/Metallic Gold) on priority and made they give me a phone call before they dropped off the package. The item looks great, in perfect shape the same it does on the pictures. Definitely looking forward to buying a new pair in a few
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes is very uncomfortable. The sharp edge around the opening in the back keeps hurting my ankles. It seems that Nike doesn't design the product right.
customer_reviews.author: YONG W.

customer_reviews.title: SECOND TO NONE@
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect and great in every way. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Wiley C.

customer_reviews.title: Worst show ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst Nike shoe I’ve ever bought or owned. Hurt my feet immediately upon wearing them. Tried them for an hr or so. Killed me. No support at ankle either.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE DELUCAu

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms of the shoe blew out after a month of use not very durable nothing better than getting a flat on your training shoe
customer_reviews.author: dean dunning

customer_reviews.title: Air Vapormax 2019
customer_reviews.text: Hi my son didn't like the color I will like to know if I can change it for another color
customer_reviews.author: dacyl saco

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are ok.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes in person wasnt what I expected. Runs a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Evans

customer_reviews.title: THEY RUN SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why others here don't say so, but these do run very tight around the top of the foot. Get a larger size. I am having to return mine, when I wear the same size Air Max 270's without issue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baty

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people are saying they run small. I have worn size 13 my whole life and these 13s fit perfect. So far they are the most comfortable running shoes. And they give you rebound energy. Also these are real Nike's. Someone asked if they were fakes. No they are not fakes they are Nike
customer_reviews.author: Jason Page

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and upset
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE .... very upset when I received the product it was crinkled up on the toe part and box was lol tore up this is a gift well WAS a gift now I have to purchase something else and they used TAPE to tape box up
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Ross

customer_reviews.title: PoorQuality
customer_reviews.text: Wore 6 times and I have a flat sole. They are now unwearable and I paid $260.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Adams

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Vapormax 2019 Track & Field Shoes
